channel.title: T X's (Mark Gore) Model converter
channel.description:
T X's (Mark Gore) Model converter.
I came across this model converter made by T X, it converts models to x3d then back and repacks.
Read his github to see how to execute the program.
Link: https://github.com/MarkGore/RSCModelsConvert
Main Class: https://github.com/MarkGore/RSCModelsConvert/blob/master/src/org/mark/rsc/models/Converter.java

item.title: T X's (Mark Gore) Model converter

item.title: T X's (Mark Gore) Model converter
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

hi tx

[quote=“agiv, post:1, topic:517183”]This is all the rsc models converted to an easy x3d format.

To edit or view these models use meshlabs http://meshlab.sourceforge.net/

Preview:
[im]http://i.imgur.com/zWAOgLy.png[/img]
[im]http://i.imgur.com/dJW30f8.png[/img]
[im]http://i.imgur.com/zaXgECL.png[/img]

The converter will be posted on github within the next couple of days. Also an x3d to ob3. ob3 to model cache will be posted to.

Hope you enjoy.[/quote]

Read full topic
